content: Hi there! I live in Klosterneuburg / Maria Gugging, that is an Austrian town near Vienna. Is anyone nearby?
Am I still the only Lean user around Wien?
Hi, I'm in Vienna, just started on Lean
HI Martin, Anton, I have joint responsibilities between Vienna and Leipzig at the moment so I've marked myself in Leipzig. But in principle I am partly in Vienna and also started on Lean recently.
I have upcoming travel. I will be back in Vienna in April. How about then?
Hi, I am also located in Vienna :) Please drop a message in this channel if you guys are organizing something. (April does sound good to me as well.)
Heya! I've also recently moved close to Vienna and started playing with Lean too. Would love to join a Lean meet-up as well! :smiley:

What about next week?
@Anton Mellit @Abhiram M K @György Kurucz @Ivan S.

I am in Leipzig Next Week unfortunately and then have a long summer travel
schedule.

What about next week?

For me it's fine. (In general I don't have big plans for May, so probably any week works.)
Hello everyone! We are organising a Lean tutorial at TU Wien this September. Please see #announce > Lean Tutorial in Vienna, September 18-20 for the announcement. I would be happy to see you there!
We should meet again! It has been a year...
@Ivan S. until when will you be in Austria?
